scene1.narration: Maine winter hits different. Fresh powder blankets endless forests while snowflakes dance through towering pines under crystal-clear skies.
scene1.image: Aerial view of snow-covered Maine wilderness with tall evergreen trees, pristine white snow sparkling in sunlight, gentle snowfall, mountains in distance, untouched forest landscape

scene2.narration: From cozy fireplaces to thrilling slopes, Maine's winter wonderland calls your name. Your perfect snow escape starts here.
scene2.image: Split scene showing families sledding down snowy hills and a rustic cabin with warm golden light glowing from windows, smoke rising from chimney, people in winter gear laughing

storyboard.fullNarration:
Maine winter hits different. Fresh powder blankets endless forests while snowflakes dance through towering pines under crystal-clear skies.

From cozy fireplaces to thrilling slopes, Maine's winter wonderland calls your name. Your perfect snow escape starts here.
